Hi all,

Long-time lurker, first-time poster.

I'm looking for images of pe=
asants from around the time of the Sengoku
period, in particular images of =
peasants fighting with the Ikko-Ikki
armies.

More broadly, does anyone hav=
e any good links to a repository of
contemporary (or nearso) illustrations =
of Sengoku-era battles?

Many thanks!
David
